meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rocky.
meanings.sent1: The rockinesses of the mountain made climbing difficult.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the rockinesses under my feet as I hiked along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The rockinesses of the terrain added an extra challenge to the outdoor adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her path to success was filled with unexpected rockinesses.
meanings.sent5: The rockinesses of the landscape created a beautiful, rugged scenery.

meanings.definition: The rough, uneven surface of rocks.
meanings.sent1: The hiker carefully navigated the rockinesses of the boulder field.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed exploring the rockinesses of the shore during low tide.
meanings.sent3: The rockinesses of the ground made it tricky for the dog to find a comfortable spot to lie down.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of the rockinesses in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The rockinesses of the cliff provided a challenging but rewarding climb for the experienced climber.
